item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Eighty Years of the Finite Element Method (2022) (130 points | 61 comments)
3. The motor turns too much (221 points | 84 comments)

7. Get me out of data hell (256 points | 74 comments)
8. SpawELO – small free matchmaking system for LAN parties (125 points | 27 comments)

20. Inspecting North Korea's Digital Map App: Licensing and API Insights (26 points | 10 comments)

22. The Language of Faces (30 points | 13 comments)

26. Cash: A small jQuery alternative for modern browsers (140 points | 111 comments)
27. GitHub Spark lets you build web apps in plain English (23 points | 2 comments)
28. Signal: Online MIDI Editor (111 points | 19 comments)
29. Ghosts in the Machine (65 points | 33 comments)
